titleStmt.title: Tho. Brown's recantation of his Satyr on the French King. Facit recantatio versum.
titleStmt.author: Brown, Thomas, 1663-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by most booksellers in London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: First line: And has this bitch my muse trapan'd me.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland--Crawford Collections.
